messages.title: Education Investment
messages.content: Children like ours are getting a far better education because of Labour's investment in local schools.

messages.title: Opinion on Conservative Party
messages.content: The Tories would just turn their backs on us if they win the election like they did in the 1980s and 1990s.

messages.title: Support for Youth Services
messages.content: Maria works really hard for the area and campaigned with me against the Lib Dem cuts to youth services.

messages.title: Winter Fuel Allowance
messages.content: Many are worried that the Tories will snatch it back. They didn't do anything for older people the last time they were in power.

messages.title: Sure Start and Child Tax Credits
messages.content: I've really been helped through Labour's Sure Start scheme and Child Tax Credits.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's investment in local schools leads to a far better education.

issues.education: Labour's investment in local schools leads to a far better education.
issues.socialWelfare: Concerns about the Tories taking away the Winter Fuel Allowance and not doing anything for older people; benefits from Labour's Sure Start scheme and Child Tax Credits.

endorsements.endorsement: Maria works really hard for the area and campaigned with me against the Lib Dem cuts to youth services.
The Winter Fuel Allowance we get every year is a real God send. Many are worried that the Tories will snatch it back.
Children like ours are getting a far better education because of Labour's investment in local schools.
South Liverpool and Halewood need a Labour government. The Tories would just turn their backs on us if they win the election like they did in the 1980s and 1990s.
I've really been helped through Labour's Sure Start scheme and Child Tax Credits.

images.caption: Use both your votes for Labour
